Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Shimoda Prince Hotel in Shimoda, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Shirahama Jinja Shrine, and close to Shirahama Beach. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Mount Nesugatayama Observatory and Sotoura Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 134 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Dial-up Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including hot springs, a spa tub, and a seasonal outdoor pool.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

With a stay at Shimoda Prince Hotel in Shimoda, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Shirahama Jinja Shrine, and close to Shirahama Beach. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Mount Nesugatayama Observatory and Sotoura Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Shirahama Jinja Shrine - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Shirahama Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Mount Nesugatayama Observatory - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Sotoura Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Gyokusen-ji Temple - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Ogasaki Wing Lookout - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Hofuku-ji Temple - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Monument to Perry's Landing - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Shimoda Park - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Ryosen-Ji Treasure Museum - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Ryosen-ji Temple - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Choraku-ji Temple - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Shimoda History Museum - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Cape Tsumeki - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Tsumekizaki - 4 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Shimoda Prince Hotel is Tokyo (NRT-Narita Intl.) - 175.7 km / 109.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
